name: Chef Merge - Fun Match Puzzle
description:
Chef Merge is a relaxing fun puzzle game in which you can decorate mansions and merge elements. Just like wandering on a farm, in this fun merge game, you can see vegetables & fruits, crops everywhere. Just tap, drag & merge them to create values!
Trading things you merged with your special neighbors, to get coins and diamonds for decorating mansions! The pattern of the carpet, the shape of the light, the style of the chairs & table.....It all depends on you! You can just realize your ideas for designing, pick up your favorite decorations - buy fancy furniture, flooring, and wallpaper to create your own mansion in Chef Merge!




How to play:
1. Tap the boxes which have a lightning mark on them, to get new items for you to merge
2. Drag the same items together to merge them up
3. See what your neighbors want on the top of the game board, merge those certain items, and sell your products to them to get surprising rewards
4. Complete the decorating task by using the coins you got, make a special mansion for yourself



Features：
1. Comfortable & soft color designing, relaxing background music, make you feel at ease.
2. Vivid & cute farming elements bring you a special game experience with less pressure and more fun.
3. No time limit, no force in passing levels or competing with other players. You can just follow your own pace to make any movements.
4. More mansions for creating. You can design mansions in styles you like!
5. Exercise your fingers and test your skills and strategies in a merge puzzle game.
6. Collect farming elements and make an album for them. You can show your harvest easily by showing a screenshot of the album.


If you are a merge/match game mania, do not miss Chef Merge! It's easy to pick up and manage. Many new elements will generate when you make a move, as well as the entertainment of a merge game, which will definitely please you！
Chef Merge will be updated with more blast merges to solve and more beautiful mansions regularly! Stay tuned for updates and drop us a review!
